description:
11.92 field
Extract a single field from an interlaced image using stride
arithmetic to avoid wasting CPU time. The output frames are marked as
non-interlaced.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: field

options.description: Specify whether to extract the top (if the value is 0 or top) or the bottom field (if the value is 1 or bottom).
options.name: type
